job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: stronguJob DescriptionbrbrustrongEnsure production reliability quality for our suite of applications by working with SRE and support engineersbrbrUnderstand functionaltechnical implementation of our apps and setup proactive alerts based on that to avoid user impactbrbrOrganizeLead incident free deployments with thorough scrutiny working with ops support engineering and SRE teamsbrbrContinously evaluate user traffic usage patterns  system performance and derive plans for optimization accordinglybrbrManage and drive critical incidents to resolution without delays by working with all involved internal teamsexternal teams with prioritizing customer impact alwaysbrbrMust be an expert in Splunk AppDynamics Linux and related scriptingbrbrExperience in systems both onpremise data center and on public cloud AWS GCP etcbrbrExcellent troubleshooting and problem solving skills
